price: Er sagte: Hier sind meine Töchter, wenn ihr etwas tun wollt.
arabic: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: qāla hāulāi banātī in kuntum fāʿilīna
